column2:
"<%me>.
And Matoi."
"...Xiao, we're in a hurry!"

"I know, to help out Sukuna-hime.
You're going to Harkotan?"

"However, that is not allowed.
As Administrator of ARKS, I order
you to stay here."
"But... why?!"
"Don't you think you're fighting too much?"

"Not just Darkers,
but [Elder], [Loser], [Apprentice],
and [Double], from its own universe."
"And by doing so, you've absorbed their darkness. You could burst at any moment."
"But-!"
"NO! DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND?!"
"YOU COULD DIE!"
"1. So, you want us to abandon them?"
"2. You want them to die, but not us?"
"...Saying it that way is unfair."
"...Xiao, we thank you for your concerns."
"But, we need to go help Sukuna-hime... We have to stop [Double]."

"<%me>!
Matoi!
I'm the Administrator of ARKS."

"I will not be lenient, even during an emergency.
Remember that..."
"...Please, be safe."
